title: Foundational assessment
description: Core tendencies that show up across contexts. These lightly inform your base archetype balance.

questions.text: I naturally take initiative and get momentum going.
questions.question_text: I naturally take initiative and get momentum going.

questions.text: Around others, I tend to spark energy and get people engaged.
questions.question_text: Around others, I tend to spark energy and get people engaged.

questions.text: I can shift stale moods with playful mischief or a quick challenge.
questions.question_text: I can shift stale moods with playful mischief or a quick challenge.

questions.text: I actively seek out new experiences and perspectives.
questions.question_text: I actively seek out new experiences and perspectives.

questions.text: I feel energized—not stressed—by a bit of uncertainty or the unknown.
questions.question_text: I feel energized—not stressed—by a bit of uncertainty or the unknown.

questions.text: I learn fastest by doing small experiments instead of long debates.
questions.question_text: I learn fastest by doing small experiments instead of long debates.

questions.text: People rely on me to keep things grounded and steady.
questions.question_text: People rely on me to keep things grounded and steady.

questions.text: I prefer reliable routines that let me go deep over time.
questions.question_text: I prefer reliable routines that let me go deep over time.

questions.text: Being prepared and following through is part of how I show care.
questions.question_text: Being prepared and following through is part of how I show care.

questions.text: When direction is needed, I’m comfortable making the call.
questions.question_text: When direction is needed, I’m comfortable making the call.

questions.text: Big, challenging goals bring out my best self.
questions.question_text: Big, challenging goals bring out my best self.

questions.text: I’m good at setting clear boundaries and holding a course under pressure.
questions.question_text: I’m good at setting clear boundaries and holding a course under pressure.

questions.text: I notice patterns and dynamics that others might miss.
questions.question_text: I notice patterns and dynamics that others might miss.

questions.text: I regularly zoom out to reflect on what’s really driving a situation.
questions.question_text: I regularly zoom out to reflect on what’s really driving a situation.

questions.text: I can put feelings or subtext into words in ways that land for people.
questions.question_text: I can put feelings or subtext into words in ways that land for people.

questions.text: I care about craft, detail, and elevating the experience for everyone involved.
questions.question_text: I care about craft, detail, and elevating the experience for everyone involved.

questions.text: The sensory quality (aesthetics, pacing, texture) matters a lot to me.
questions.question_text: The sensory quality (aesthetics, pacing, texture) matters a lot to me.

questions.text: I savor great tools and materials and notice small refinements.
questions.question_text: I savor great tools and materials and notice small refinements.

questions.text: I enjoy guiding change—remixing what’s there into something new.
questions.question_text: I enjoy guiding change—remixing what’s there into something new.

questions.text: When contexts shift, I adapt quickly and help others pivot too.
questions.question_text: When contexts shift, I adapt quickly and help others pivot too.

questions.text: Marking beginnings and endings with small symbols or phrases feels natural to me.
questions.question_text: Marking beginnings and endings with small symbols or phrases feels natural to me.
